FAQ Mirrors

The primary site for this FAQ is located in The Netherlands. You might like to try one of the following mirrors:

Netherlands http://www.worldofspectrum.org/faq/
Canada http://ca.sinclairfaq.org/cssfaq/
Poland http://www.phys.uni.torun.pl/~jacek/zx/faq/
United Kingdom http://uk.sinclairfaq.org/cssfaq/
United Kingdom http://www.srcf.ucam.org/~pak21/cssfaq/
United States http://www.guildsofcamelot.org.uk/cssfaq/

Key:
Mirror Available and Up-to-date
Mirror Available but Out-of-date
Mirror Unavailable / Check Failed

Mirrors are checked every morning at 06:25 GMT by comparing http://ca.sinclairfaq.org/cssfaq/LASTUPDATED with the same file in the CSS FAQ root directory on the mirrors — if this file is missing on the mirror, the check will fail.

If you would like to mirror the FAQ, please let us know.

This FAQ is also available for offline use - please see the versions page for more information.
